description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires five (5) hotel rooms in Ottawa, Ontario with daily parking. The Work is to be performed during the period of January 5 to March 31, 2023.
full_summary:
## Hotel Accommodations in Ottawa
### Solicitation Number : 202303402
### Tender Closing Date: Monday, 2022-12-20, 14:00:00 EST

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting competitive proposals from qualified contractors to provide hotel accommodations in Ottawa, Ontario.

### Tender Summary

The RCMP is seeking a qualified contractor to provide hotel accommodations in Ottawa, Ontario for a specific period. The approved accommodation shall be a standard hotel room with daily parking. The Work shall be performed during the period of January 5, 2023 to March 31, 2023.

### Description of the Solicitation

The solicitation is a Request for Proposal, Non-Competitive Standing Offer. The selection criteria will be based on the following factors:

Evaluation Factors for Award:    Price, Supplier Past Performance,   Supplier Fiscal Responsiblity

The bid solicitation requires all potential contractors to provide the necessary documentation, including experience and qualifications. The tender documents are available for download at the [Canada Buy and Sell website]{https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/55b94e2225848abed22528ab53e5fb14/rfp_hotel_accommodations_in_ottawa.pdf}

 

The solicitation documents are available in both French and English. Bidders are responsible for ensuring they have access to and can provide the approved hotel accommodations prior to submitting their bid.

### Contact Information

For further information or to obtain tenders, please contact :

Susie Dias
  Royal Canadian Mounted Police
  73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa ON K1A OR2 Canada
  Phone : 514-258-7890
  Email: susie.dias@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

### Attachment Documents

Tender 202303402 Solicitation Amendment _ Solicitation Modification 1.pdf, 
Tender Hotel Accommodations in Ottawa.pdf 
 Payment Basis of Payment Amendment 1.pdf

Only bidder who meet all legal requirements may submit bid
Bid must be submitted os 2022-12-20, 14:00:00 EST. *
The solicitation is only open to bidders who can provide hotel accommodation with all require amenities.



Let me know if you can be finished before 1700 today. 
Thank you for getting in touch. I'll be happy to share some further ideas once you are done. 

looks forward to your call
